title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1642-6.3 - Insurance ledger
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1642-6.3 - Insurance ledger

State Regulations

All transactions relating to insurance shall be
recorded in an insurance ledger. A specimen form of insurance ledger is shown
as Exhibit 18 of Appendix S-8, and described in section
1642-3.11. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1642-6.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
